name: Flashey
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 51!

Theme: Every 10 seconds.

Your power went out, all you have to navigate and turn the power back on is a polaroid camera that's on the fritz and keeps flashing every 10 seconds!

This is a VR-only title and was built using OpenXR- it should run on any SteamVR or Oculus headset via PC.

Controls:

  • Grip button - Grab
  • Left joystick - Walk
  • Right joystick - Snap rotate
  • A/X button (while holding picture) - Save polaroid to file
